review: I was searching for a cosmetic dentist for a bit as my wedding date was nearing and thankfully, found Dr. Ankita Gehi. She went out of the way to make my smile designing experience so positive and painless. The moment I stepped into Aakaar dentistry, I was greeted and treated with friendliness and professionalism. The clinic is aesthetically inviting, but she and her staff are what makes the dental experience there top-of-the-line. Be it Invisalign treatment, zoom teeth whitening or a regular cleaning, she’s been my go to person since then. Her honest suggestions and extensive experience has made me trust her completely for my family’s dental health as well. I recommend all the brides to visit her for a beautiful, confident smile. Highly, highly recommended.

It's dentistry like you have never imagined before. The clinic is so beautiful and the team is so warm and friendly. I am so happy I found them, it did take some research to find a dentist specifically because I do have a lot of dental anxiety and these guys put me at ease, so thank you soo very much. I would recommend them a hundred percent.
Had a wonderful experience with Aakaar, the doctors and the entire team are thorough professionals. The treatment went smoothly from start to finish. Would recommend them a 100 percent!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
